means: （战时特准攻击敌方商船的）武装民船，私掠船

sentence.Network_en: I hear the captain has already served the Crown as a privateer.
sentence.Network_cn: 我听说船长是以海盗船的名义效忠皇家的.

sentence.Network_en: Privateer: Privately owned vessel a state at war to attack enemy ships, usually merchant vessels.
sentence.Network_cn: 武装民船: 为交战国征用以攻击敌方船只(常是商船)的私有武装船只.

sentence.Network_en: That's a Netherlander privateer. You're a heretic Dutchman. You're pirates. God have mercy on you!
sentence.Network_cn: 那船是一艘尼德兰海盗船. 你是个荷兰异教徒. 你们是海盗. 愿上帝宽恕你们!

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from private, on the pattern of volunteer

means.word_mean: 1. an officer or crew member of a privateer
2. a privately owned warship commissioned to prey on the commercial shipping or warships of an enemy nation
